context: I'm cool with our government's enemies.  I'm not cool with our government, and I'm not cool with our government's allies.  Fortunately,  there is a real and living God.  He will continue to systematically take America down as He continues to simultaneously lift up our government's government's foreign adversaries.   America will discover that its military's arms were too short and too weak to box with God.

replies.context: Next time you see, or speak to, god and jesus tell them I said hi, and thanks for nothing making Biden president.

context: I hope those robot ships have avoidance systems to keep from running into each other.
